statements.sql: select `psa_campaign`.`id`, `psa_campaign`.`brand_id`, `psa_campaign`.`application_deadline`, `psa_campaign`.`compensation`, `psa_campaign`.`other_compensation`, `psa_campaign`.`condition`, `psa_campaign`.`created_at`, `psa_campaign`.`details`, `psa_campaign`.`disclosure`, `psa_campaign`.`guidelines`, `psa_campaign`.`hashtag`, `psa_campaign`.`identity`, `psa_campaign`.`campaign_image`, `psa_campaign`.`location_sity`, `psa_campaign`.`location_state`, `psa_campaign`.`media`, `psa_campaign`.`mention`, `psa_campaign`.`minimum_reach`, `psa_campaign`.`posting_date`, `psa_campaign`.`social_network`, `psa_campaign`.`status`, `psa_campaign`.`submission_deadline`, `psa_campaign`.`title`, `psa_campaign`.`type`, `psa_campaign`.`updated_at`, `psa_campaign`.`url`, `psa_campaign`.`visibility`, `psa_brands`.`brand_name`, `psa_brands`.`image_url` as `brand_logo` from `psa_campaign` left join `psa_brands` on `psa_brands`.`identity` = `psa_campaign`.`brand_id` where `psa_campaign`.`identity` = 'b82da42d-1f39-4d73-9cea-d9c8e3bb5117' limit 1

params.hints: LIMIT without ORDER BY causes non-deterministic results, depending on the query execution plan

statements.sql: select `psa_social_account`.*, `psa_influencers_campaign`.`status`, `psa_influencers`.`first_name`, `psa_influencers`.`last_name` from `psa_influencers_campaign` inner join `psa_users` on `psa_influencers_campaign`.`influencer_id` = `psa_users`.`identity` inner join `psa_influencers` on `psa_influencers`.`email` = `psa_users`.`email` inner join `psa_social_account` on `psa_social_account`.`user_identity` = `psa_users`.`identity` where `psa_influencers_campaign`.`campaign_id` = 'b82da42d-1f39-4d73-9cea-d9c8e3bb5117' and (`psa_influencers_campaign`.`status` = 'invited' or `psa_influencers_campaign`.`status` = 'applied' or `psa_influencers_campaign`.`status` = 'application accepted' or `psa_influencers_campaign`.`status` = 'application declined') group by `psa_users`.`identity`
select * from `psa_interest_campaign` inner join `psa_interests` on `psa_interests`.`identity` = `psa_interest_campaign`.`interest_id` where `campaign_id` = 'b82da42d-1f39-4d73-9cea-d9c8e3bb5117'
